Summary: bright white light flys overhead no sound
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Niagara Falls
There were no other sightings in Niagara Falls on or around March 5th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside looking east, seen a plane coming from over the horizon and I then looked above me and seen a bright white oval object flying at a fair pace headed east. It made no sound at all, and when the plane that I observed in the sky started to get close I heard it well. What was interesting with the object it that before it was close to the horizon just started going down from my perspective it just dissapeared, much sooner to dissapear over the horizon. I believe I was seeing the big dipper and the object just dissapered from below the right of the big dipper. I should really get a camera.
